settings.text: The XbotGo BLE Remote Control is your ticket to seamless control over XbotGo gimbals, adding a layer of convenience to your recording experience. Here's what this powerful remote controller brings to the table:

The XbotGo Remote Controller lets you control XbotGo gimbals wirelessly from up to 30 feet away.

You can switch effortlessly between four working modes (video/photo/direction/tagging) and control gimbal directions (up/down/left/right) without having to hold your phone.

With just one click, you can tag important moments for later auto-editing via the cloud.

Portable and compact, this remote controller can be operated with one hand. Take charge of your gimbal remotely and capture photos just the way you want.

Features:

Compatibility: Built specifically for XbotGo Gimbal, ensuring flawless integration with the XbotGo App.

Highlight Tagging: Tag crucial moments effortlessly for auto-highlight generation. Your video highlights will be automatically generated based on these tags once uploaded to the XbotGo Cloud.

Recording Control: Effortlessly rotate the gimbal, enabling smooth pan and tilt motions for professional-grade footage.

Steering Control: Effortlessly rotate the gimbal, enabling smooth pan and tilt motions for professional-grade footage.

Photo Capture: Capture snapshots with ease while the camera auto-tracks and records.

Free Battery: Each XbotGo BLE Remote Controller comes with a complimentary CR2032 battery, ensuring you're ready to roll right out of the box.

settings.title: What is XbotGo?
settings.answer: XbotGo is a smart tracking system designed for sports enthusiasts and their families. We can turn an iPhone into a fully automated camera to capture team sports with ease. Simple put your iPhone on our gimbal, along with Xbot Go App together, the system can automatically follow, record and live stream sports games like basketball and soccer games, with minimum interventions.

settings.title: How does XbotGo follow and track?
settings.answer: We use AI technology to detect the position of the ball and players, analyze the speed, pose and actions of players. Our patented algorithm will decide where the action is based on the information analyzed, and control the gimbal to follow through. In particular, all these are completed on smartphones real time. Even if the phone is not connected to Internet, it is still able to track and record. Please find demo videos at https://www.youtube.com/@XbotGo. All demos are shared by our real users.

settings.title: How to set up XbotGo gimbal?
settings.answer:
Please have the following ready before set up:

- XbotGo Gimbal

- iPhone X or a newer model with iOS 14 or newer

- XbotGo App (downloaded from Apple App Store)

- Tripod (sold separately) or any other tripod with 1/4” head in screw

Put iPhone on Xbot Blink Focos gimbal, and setup the gimbal on a tripod on the side of the sports field. Open Blink Focos App, connect App with the gimbal, and then click the recording button and you can just relax. Xbot Blink Focos system will automatically track players, follow through the game, record it, and/or live stream it to whoever you want to share.


Note: we recommend the gimbal to be placed near the center line of the sports field. Otherwise, the tracking performance would be compromised.

settings.title: What sports can XbotGo support?
settings.answer: XbotGo can support basketball and soccer games. For basketball games, it supports half court and full court tracking. For soccer games, it supports 5x5, 7x7, 9x9, and 11x11 fields. It will  cover more team sports, and adding more features like smart video editing and recording with multiple cameras (Focos Pro).

settings.title: Do you support DSLR or mirrorless camera?
settings.answer: XbotGo app does not support DSLR, mirrorless camera.

settings.title: Can XbotGo gimbal be used as a handheld stabilizer?
settings.answer: Yes. Even though XbotGo is designed to follow and record team sport games automatically on a tripod, it can be doubled as a regular handheld stabilizer for any occasions as well. Download the Gimbal Pro app for more features.

settings.title: Where do you ship products from?
settings.answer: We are based in Mountain View, California. However, we have warehouses in the United States, Australia, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Germany, and we provide free shipping within the USA,, AU, DE, FR, ES, IT, PL, NL. We provide international shipping with fees and deliver in about 12 business days.

settings.title: What is the product warranty and what’s the return policy?
settings.answer: XbotGo provides 1-year warranty. We also provide 30-day money-back guarantee. Please check the return policy here for more details.

settings.title: What tripod should I use?
settings.answer:
If you are trying to record sports on a small field such as basketball court or 5v5 soccer field, you could choose our portable XbotGo Gimbal T1 Tripod which is about 4 feet tall and super easy to fold and unfold. 

On the other hand, if your goal is mainly for activities on a large filed such as 9v9 or 11v11 soccer, we highly recommend you use a 12 ft or taller tripod. It will give you a better tracking performance and a much better view angle. We are still working on Blink tripod T4 and it should be launched on US market early Oct. 

In both cases, the customized tripods should provide a great user experience. That being said, you could also choose a third-party tripod. Look for 1/4" screw in head. The majority of tripods on the market should support that and thus compatible with XbotGo gimbal.

settings.title: How does cloud storage work?
settings.answer: For now, we wouldn’t charge anything for the cloud storage. Feel free to upload your videos there and share with your families or friends.

settings.title: Can XbotGo gimbal track individual player?
settings.answer: The single mode has now gone live. It tracks the person closest to the camera, usually within a distance of about ten meters.

settings.title: What if I have questions and feedbacks?
settings.answer: You could let us know your feedback or even participate our Blink Beta program to help test new sports or new features. Email support@blinktech.us for more information.

settings.title: Is there any subscription fees?
settings.answer: We don't charge subscription fee and there's no any hidden fees beyond the charge for the hardware.
